comments.content:
Hi Jesper,  
that’s probably a version that didn’t make it to digital.  
 [ITC Caslon 540](http://web.archive.org/web/20091206062322/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/caslon_no_540_std_italic/?&sample_text=Climbing%20High%20Mountains%20%26%20J) brings you very close, though.

Funny: the ‘b’ in ‘Climbing’ is actually an alternate ‘h’.  
F

Seems to be some version of Caslon.

greetings Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20091206062322/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)

Thanx a bunch - ITC Caslon 540 is close.

Regards  
J
